title.en: My Stepmother Made Me Fall For Her

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ zài liàn zōng bèi yǐng hòu hòumā qiángzhì àile

altTitles.zh: 我在恋综被影后后妈强制爱了

altTitles.ru: Мачеха заставила меня в неё влюбиться

altTitles.en: I was forced to love by my stepmother
Stepmom made me fall in love with her
I was forced to be intimate with my stepmother, a movie queen, in a love show

description.en: Ruan Tao, who originally wanted to dominate the entertainment world, encounters her malicious stepmother at the very beginning of her career. However, the stepmother is a great actress who dominates the world of entertainment with an iron fist. Ruan Tao can only submit and at the same time think about how to overthrow the evil stepmother's reactionary forces!As a result, she is arranged to participate in a romance reality show with her stepmother, but who is to tell her that it isn't a young love reality show with men and women courting each other? What is the plot when the stepmother holds her hand and asks with concern, fearing that she will hurt herself?
description.zh: 明艳腹黑大影后小妈x骄纵任性小辣椒女儿 原本想要称霸娱乐圈的阮桃一出道就撞上了自己黑心的后妈，奈何后妈是在娱乐圈只手遮天的大影后，阮桃只能夹着尾巴做人，顺便想着怎么才能打倒恶毒后妈的反动势力！结果就被安排和后妈一起参加恋综，可是谁来告诉她，不是男女嘉宾卿卿我我的青春恋爱综艺吗?后妈拉着她的手嘘寒问暖生怕她磕着碰着是什么剧情?

title.en: Heisei Haizanhei ☆ Sumire-chan

altTitles.ja: 平成敗残兵☆すみれちゃん
平成敗残兵⭐︎すみれちゃん
平成敗残兵すみれちゃん

description.en:
A formerly unsuccessful idol turned vagrant, Sumire-chan (31). A vanquished survivor of the cutthroat competition in the showbiz world, with her mind and body both beaten by the struggle, she now lives in a run-down apartment where she spends her days lazing around, for the time being.  Her cousin Yuusei, a first-year highschooler, has been keeping an eye on her and comes to her with a proposal for a moneymaking idea.

"You have a nice body, so let's release a doujin gravure photobook."
Will Sumire-chan actually be able to stage a comeback in the world of the Reiwa era!? Let's stay tuned!
description.ja: 元・売れないアイドル、現・プータローの『すみれちゃん』31歳。芸能界の熾烈な競争に敗北し、カラダもココロもボコられた彼女は、とりあえずボロアパートでゴロゴロする日々を過ごしていた。そんな彼女に目をつけた従兄弟の高校1年生『ゆうせい』が、とある儲け話を持ちかける。「カラダはいいんだから同人グラビア写真集出そうよ」。果たしてすみれちゃんは令和の世でリベンジをかませるのか!　乞うご期待！

title.en: Kimi Janakya Dame na Dorei Shoujo

altTitles.ja: 君じゃなきゃダメな奴隷少女

altTitles.th: ทาสสาวของผมคนเดียวเท่านั้น

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi ja Nakya Dame na Dorei Shoujo

description.en: Daito's your average high-school kid. After getting home one day, he finds a strange girl sleeping on the floor—only to find out she's a slave from another world. He decides to take her in so she can start life anew as a normal girl, beginning their sweet-but-unusual life together as they navigate cultural barriers.

title.en: Tsuki no Oki ni Mesu mama

altTitles.ja: 月のお気に召すまま

description.en:
In middle school, Ayumu kept getting teased and pranked by Runa, even though he's a year below her.  
Now that she's in her second year of high school, she's ready to be the experienced senpai for the incoming freshman Runa.
description.pt-br: No fundamental, Ayumu continuava sendo provocada por Runa, apesar de ele estar um ano abaixo dela. Agora que ela está no segundo ano do ensino médio, e está pronta para ser a Senpai experiente do calouro Runa.

title.en: I Scared the Divine Lord as I Handed over the Ancient Immortal Pill

altTitles.zh-ro: Kaiju Shang Jiao Taigu Xian Yao, Wo Xia Huai Sheng Zhu

altTitles.zh: 开局上交太古仙药，我吓坏圣主

altTitles.id: Aku menakuti sang dewa agung dengan menyerahkan ramuan surgawi kuno

description.en: Bai Yifan has an ancient ring that allows him to travel freely between the Earth and the fantasy world, and he has discovered that "plants and animals" on the Earth will evolve into treasures when they are taken to the fantasy world. An apple evolves into an immortal fruit, an egg will hatch into a phoenix or an earth dog has the bloodline of a dragon. One could even use tobacco to manipulate the enemy to their advantage.
description.id: Bai Yifan memiliki cincin kuno yang memungkinkannya untuk melakukan perjalanan dengan bebas antara Bumi dan dunia fantasi, dan dia telah menemukan fakta bahwa "tanaman dan hewan" di Bumi akan berevolusi menjadi harta karun ketika dibawa ke dunia fantasi. Sebuah apel berevolusi menjadi buah abadi, sebuah telur akan menetas menjadi burung phoenix atau seekor serigala bumi yang memiliki garis keturunan naga. Mereka bahkan dapat menggunakan tembakau untuk memanipulasi musuhnya.

title.en: Seijo ja nakatta no de, Oukyuu de nonbiri Gohan wo Tsukuru koto ni shimashita

altTitles.en: I'm Not the Saint, so I'll Just Leisurely Make Food at the Royal Palace

altTitles.zh: 反正不是聖女在王宮裏悠閒地做飯好了

altTitles.ja: 聖女じゃなかったので、王宮でのんびりご飯を作ることにしました

description.en:
Rina was summoned to another world to be the Saint, but was surprised at how bad the food tasted. It tastes like this even at the royal palace…? I’ll just make it myself, so give me your kitchen! Relieved of her Saint duties, Rina wins the heart and stomachs of the nobles through her food!  
  
[alt. Raw](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/44992)

title.en: We Are Not Dating!!

description.en:
“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!
description.id:
Sebuah karya baru dari author Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim

“Kenapa kamu terus tanya kalau kita pacaran? Kita cuma bergandengan tangan, kita nggak pacaran!!”

title.en: I Can See the Forbidden Zone Rules

description.en:
Two hundred years ago, the White Mist Forbidden Land suddenly appeared, and the world underwent a huge change. Monsters and supernatural beings with various strange powers appeared. 

The White Mist Forbidden Land is known as the Forbidden Zone for Life. Only one in ten thousand people who enter it survives. 

After being imprisoned by the mysterious wall for seven years, Ye Shiqi, who was tired of life, finally stepped into the White Mist Forbidden Land again. 

With the reappearance of blindness, a set of information suddenly appeared in front of Ye Shiqi’s eyes: That is the forbidden zone rules that have troubled mankind for many years!

title.en: Empress of Another World

altTitles.th: ลิขิตรักบัลลังก์ต่างโลก

altTitles.ja: 異世界の皇妃

description.en: Crossing over into another world and time after a freak accident, Korean highschool girl Sabina is taken in by a duke of the Crentia kingdom— only to soon be offered up to the ugly old emperor as a concubine. When the king is killed by a mysterious assassin, Sabina must face the poisonous circle of other candidates in a battle for the royal seat. Can she attract the loyalty and affection of the men and women she needs on her side to survive?

title.en: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

altTitles.ja: エクソシストを堕とせない

altTitles.th: เอ็กซอร์ซิส ไม่มีวันตกหลุมรัก

altTitles.fr: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

description.en: As the strongest exorcist, a boy chosen by God was engaged in mortal combat with the Demon Kings. Although he bears the fate of humanity on his shoulders, he actually wants to make sweets peacefully. One day, he meets a girl... This is a story of love and hope growing in the midst of a holy war.
description.fr: Un jeune prêtre, entraîné par le Vatican pour devenir l'exorciste le plus puissant du monde, reçoit pour mission divine de protéger une jeune artiste, Imuri Atsuki. Sur les conseils de son mentor, il espère néanmoins trouver l'amour afin de soulager son esprit du lourd fardeau qui lui incombe. Imuri sera-t-elle celle qui lui apportera son salut ?
description.ja: 神に選ばれし少年は、最強のエクソシストとして魔王たちと死闘を繰り広げていた。人類の命運を背負いつつも本当は静かにお菓子作りをしていたい、そんな彼に訪れた一人の少女との出会い…。これは壮絶な聖戦の中で芽吹いた、恋と希望の物語。

title.en: I am the Last Villainess He Has to Kill

altTitles.ko: 나는 그가 죽여야 할 마지막 악당이다.

description.en:
When people get transported into novels, they usually end up as noble ladies, even if they're villains. But I ended up as the final monster that the male lead must kill—the daughter of the Demon King.

"Here’s your favorite finger necklace, Princess!"

Abduction and murder are the norm among demons. 
I can’t live with these creatures for 5,000 years! 
I just need to endure it, fulfill my role according to the original story, and move on to the next novel! 
Oh, God. How is this even possible? 
This isn’t some stray cat adoption; it’s like adopting the male lead! 
And the eight-year-old Kiel is saying some very ominous things.

“Can I eat you?”
"Well... I’ll raise you with care, so come kill the Demon King’s daughter later."
description.pt-br:
Quando as pessoas são transportadas para dentro de romances, geralmente acabam como damas nobres, mesmo que sejam vilãs. Mas eu acabei como o monstro final que o protagonista deve matar - a filha do Rei Demônio.

"Aqui está o seu colar de dedos favorito, Princesa!"

Sequestros e assassinatos são normais entre os demônios.

Eu não posso viver com essas criaturas por 5.000 anos!

Só preciso aguentar, cumprir meu papel de acordo com a história original e seguir para o próximo romance!

Oh, Deus. Como isso é possível?

Isso não é como adotar um gato de rua; é como adotar o protagonista!

E o Kiel, de oito anos, está dizendo coisas muito sinistras.

"Posso te comer?"

"Bem... Vou te criar com cuidado, então venha matar a filha do Rei Demônio mais tarde."

title.en: An Ode To Youth

description.en: Cheongwook and Unho have been living together for three months due to unavoidable circumstances. These two, who have nothing to do with each other, keep fighting over trivial matters. Just when the anger between them builds up and is about to explode, Unho gets caught with his secret by Cheongwook.

title.en: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku o! Fantastic Days!

altTitles.ja: この素晴らしい世界に祝福を！ ファンタスティックデイズ

altTitles.en: Gifting this Wonderful World with Blessings! Fantastic Days!

altTitles.ru: Да будет благословенен этот прекрасный мир! Фантастические дни!

altTitles.pt-br: Presenteando este Mundo Maravilhoso com Bênçãos! Dias Fantásticos!

description.en: Manga adaptation of the mobile game Konosuba: Fantastic Days
description.pt-br: Adaptação em mangá do jogo para celular KonoSuba: Fantastic Days

title.en: Utsukushii Kare

altTitles.ja: 美しい彼

description.en:
High schooler at the bottom of the social ladder x Beautiful King of the topmost caste! Nagira Yuu’s big hit series, now a manga!!

Beautiful, aloof, he reigns over the class. Kiyoi has the innate qualities of a king.
At the start of a new term, in the middle of the stifling classroom, Hira, who is silent, friendless, and at the bottom of the class’s social ladder, has his heart captured in a single glance by classmate Kiyoi. Though in this world there should be no chance of them ever interacting with each other, Hira, who is treated as a gofer, suddenly finds himself with Kiyoi’s phone number entered into his phone! A single world from Kiyoi, even the spare change he receives, is precious. These lonely, suffocating feelings, could they be love? A love story interweaving two opposites begins!

title.en: Policewoman and Assassin

altTitles.ja: 婦警さんと暗殺さん

description.en:
The assassin with a scary mug has arrived in the town where an air-headed policewoman with a strong sense of justice lives! 
Although his target is a businessman, his constant flirting with the policewoman is causing him great trouble! 
The assassin constantly tries to eliminate the businessman who is in love with the policewoman… 
and if you look closely, there's a possible love triangle ?! Will the day the assassin can complete his job come ?
Keep an eye on this fantastic love comedy.

title.en: Watashi no Ue ni Ukabu "Akuyaki Reijou (Hametsu suru)" tte Nandeshou ka?

altTitles.ja: 私の上に浮かぶ『悪役令嬢(破滅する)』ってなんでしょうか？

altTitles.en: What does "Villainess (Doomed)" floating above my head mean?

description.en:
While attempting to do good deeds, she seemed to have entered the prince's doting route!

Louise, the count's daughter, for some unknown reason, can see letters above people's heads. Written above her own head are the words, "Villainess (doomed)." To change that, Louise aims to be a good-natured noblewoman. However, when she is pressed by Sylvile and tells him truthfully that his descriptor reads, "Love interest: Second Prince (Easy)" his interest is piqued and they become betrothed. Furthermore, he offers her a promise, "To make you feel at ease, I'll show you that I can change my descriptor."

title.en: Koi ni suruniha ayafuya sugiru

altTitles.ja: 恋にするにはあやふやすぎる

description.en:
“Give me just one memory.”

Since elementary school, Minami has had feelings for Yudai, his childhood friend. Even after becoming a university student, this remained an important thing that he carried with him without telling anyone. However, Minami finds out that Yudai, who he met for the first time in a while, has a girlfriend and that they are living together. He ends up drinking alcohol out of sadness. At the end of his drunken state, he dreams that Yudai appears in front of him, cries, clings to him, and holds him in his arms.

The next morning, when he woke up, there was a handsome stranger next to him...!?

title.en: Saenai Boku ga Kimi no Heya de Shiteiru Koto o Kurasumeito wa Dare mo Shiranai

altTitles.ja: 冴えない僕が君の部屋でシている事をクラスメイトは誰も知らない

altTitles.ja-ro: Saenai Boku ga Kimi no Heya de Shiteiru Koto wo Kurasumeito ha Dare mo Shiranai

altTitles.ja: I am boring, but my classmates do not know what I am doing in your room.

altTitles.en: None Of Our Classmates Know What The Boring Me Is Doing In Your Room
Our Classmates Don’t Know We’re Having Sex In Your Room
I Am Boring, but My Classmates Do Not Know What I Am Doing in Your Room.

altTitles.th: แอบไปอึ๊บกันที่ห้องโดยที่เพื่อนร่วมชั้นไม่รู้

description.en: Tōyama, an unassuming high school boy who is introverted, is walking the streets at night in search of contraceptives while having sex with his girlfriend, Takai Yumi. He finally finds a condom vending machine. Just when he thinks he finally found a condom, his classmate Marika Uehara, a beautiful girl in the upper caste of his class, sees him. After that, he was a little annoyed that Uehara tried to involved with him in any way. Uehara, who he hadn’t any contact with before even though they were in the same class, was starting to take an interest in Tōyama.
description.id:
Toyama, seorang anak SMA sederhana yang introvert, berjalan-jalan di malam hari untuk mencari alat kontrasepsi saat berhubungan seks dengan pacarnya, Takai Yumi.

Dia akhirnya menemukan mesin penjual kond*m otomatis.

Tepat ketika dia berpikir dia akhirnya menemukan cond*m, teman sekelasnya Marika Uehara, seorang gadis cantik di kasta atas kelasnya, melihatnya.

Setelah itu, dia sedikit kesal karena Uehara mencoba terlibat dengannya dengan cara apa pun.

Uehara, yang tidak pernah berhubungan dengannya sebelumnya meskipun mereka berada di kelas yang sama, mulai tertarik pada Tōyama.
description.ja:
日陰者の遠山佑希には秘密がある。それは同級生の高井柚実と肉体関係だということ。二人は互いに心までは求めず、都合がいい関係と割り切って接していた。そんなある日、佑希が街角でクラスの人気者の上原麻里花にある出来事を目撃されてしまい……。


* **遠山佑希（とおやま　ゆうき）**
ボッチ気質の陰キャ主人公。読書が趣味で一見大人しく見えるが意外と気が強い。セフレがいるためか余裕があり大人っぽく見えるらしい。

* **高井柚実（たかい　ゆみ）**
佑希のセフレで図書室の住人。佑希以上に存在感が薄く眼鏡をかけ地味な印象。本人は気づいていないが実はかなりの美人。

* **上原麻里花（うえはら　まりか）**
スクールカースト上位で派手な見た目の女子。性格は極めてよくクラスで一番人気。その華やかな見た目は周囲の異性を魅了する。
 
--- 

Hikagemono no Tōyama Yūki ni wa himitsu ga aru. Sore wa dōkyūsei no Takai yūmi to nikutai kankeida to iu koto. Futari wa tagaini kokoro made wa motomezu, tsugōgaī kankei to warikitte sesshite ita. Son'na aru Ni~Tsu, Yūki ga machikado de kurasu no ninki-sha no Uehara Mari hana ni aru dekigoto o mokugeki sa rete shimai....

* **Tōyama Yūki**
Botchi katagi no in kya shujinkō. Dokusho ga shumi de ikken otonashiku mieruga igaito ki ga tsuyoi. Sefure ga iru tame ka yoyū ga ari otonappoku mierurashī. 

* **Takai Yūmi**
Yūki no sefure de tosho-shitsu no jūnin. Yūki ijō ni sonzai-kan ga usuku megane o kake jimina inshō. Hon'nin wa kidzuite inaiga jitsuwa kanari no bijin. 

* **Uehara Marika**
Sukūrukāsuto jōi de hadena mitame no joshi. Seikaku wa kiwamete yoku kurasu de ichiban ninki. Sono hanayakana mitame wa shūi no isei o miryō suru.

title.en: Kiyota-san wa Yogosaretai!?

altTitles.ja: 清田さんは汚されたい！？

description.en:
Sumiko Kiyota is a plain, ordinary girl with a serious demeanor. While eating lunch alone as usual 
Yuki Shirakawa, the most beautiful and popular girl in class, calls out to her...
description.ja: キレイ好きで真面目で平凡な女子高生・清田澄子。ある日、昼食を食べていると学園いちの美少女・白河ユキにパンをかじられる。その日を境に二人の距離は急接近！　体操着を借りたり、相合傘をしたり、潔癖な清田さんに次々と試練が襲いかかる。「もしかして白河さん、私を汚そうとしている？」　清田さんの妄想はエスカレートしていくが…!?

title.en: Gods of All People: I Sacrificed Hundreds of Millions of Living Beings To Become a God

altTitles.zh: 全民神祇：我献祭亿万生灵成神

altTitles.en: Spirit Sacrifice: The Path to Godhood
Everyone Is a King: I Sacrifice Countless Lives to Become a King

description.en:
Han Wu transmigrated to a world where everyone can become a god. He obtained the ability to sacrifice life.
At the beginning, he had a trash clan, so he sacrificed to change his fate against the heavens.
With no power, no status, and no money, he sacrificed his way to the top.
As long as he has enough followers, he can become infinitely stronger through sacrifice, becoming the main god, the god of gods!

title.en: The Hero Girl and the Green Magician

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuusha no Musume to Midoriiro no Mahoutsukai
Yuusha no Musume to Ryokushoku no Mahoutsukai

altTitles.ja: 勇者の娘と緑色の魔法使い

description.en: In the depths of a demonic castle filled with monsters, a young hero meets a boy gifted by the supernatural. With a common goal but wildly different motivations, the most unlikely pair sets out on a quest to defeat the Dark Lord!

title.en: Sanda

altTitles.ja: サンダ

description.en:
In the year 2080, the world is like it is now, yet different. Government-arranged marriages, elaborate plastic surgery, and medical science are at the forefront of Japanese society.

Sanda Kazushige is a middle-school student who hasn't quite matured, despite being in the thralls of puberty. Put into a life-threatening situation by his classmate Fuyumura, Sanda discovers his uncanny ability to turn into a burly (and more grown) Santa Claus, and is thrown into a world of chaos to save his fellow students in only ways Santa Claus can do, while trying to solve the mysteries of the school he attends and the truth to where his supposedly-dead classmate Ono went.
description.ja: これは少し未来のお話。超少子化が進み、様々な風習が失われた近未来。大黒愛護学園に通う普通の少年、三田は、なぜか同級生の冬村四織に命を狙われていた。突如として振り下ろされる凶刃。それには、行方不明になった冬村の友人と、三田が抱えている「とある呪い」に理由があって…!?

title.en: Shikisaki Shimai wa Abakaretai

altTitles.ja: 四季崎姉妹はあばかれたい

altTitles.en: The Shikisaki Sisters Want to be Exposed

description.en: One day, Tarou Yamada, who runs a detective business, slips on a banana peel and reincarnates into Tsukushi Shikisaki, the younger brother of three beautiful big-breasted sisters who will all die on the same day. As he spends time surrounded by the three beautiful sisters, he finds out that the boy he is reincarnated as will be killed by one of the three sisters ...!?
description.ja: 探偵業を営む山田太郎はある日、バナナの皮に足を滑らせてしまい、同日に命を落とした美麗三姉妹の弟・四季崎つくしに転生をしてしまう。美人三姉妹に囲まれて過ごすことになるが、四季崎つくしが三姉妹の誰かに殺されたことに気がついてしまい…!?

title.en: Loved by All When Rebirth: The Film King's Wife Is Poor and Fierce

altTitles.zh: 重生团宠：影帝夫人又穷又凶

description.en: Sheng Wenyin was deceived and died tragically in her previous life. She was reborn as the 18th-tier female star with a lot of scandals. This time, Sheng Wenyin stopped pretending and criticized the scumbag in various ways, which made her famous. Her biological parents, five brothers, and more than a dozen nephews and nieces came to recognize her as her relatives. She was also engaged to Qi Si, the nine-time Golden Award winner, as a child.

title.en: One Piece (Official Colored)

altTitles.ja: ONE PIECE カラー版

description.el: Ο Gol D. Roger, ένας άνθρωπος που αναφέρεται ως ο «Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών», πρόκειται να εκτελεστεί από την Παγκόσμια Κυβέρνηση. Αλλά λίγο πριν τον θάνατό του, επιβεβαιώνει την ύπαρξη ενός μεγάλου θησαυρού, του One Piece, που βρίσκεται κάπου μέσα στον απέραντο ωκεανό γνωστό ως Μεγάλη Γραμμή. Ανακοινώνοντας ότι το One Piece μπορεί να διεκδικηθεί από οποιονδήποτε άξιο να το φτάσει, ο Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών εκτελείται και η Μεγάλη Εποχή των Πειρατών ξεκινά. Είκοσι χρόνια αργότερα, ένας νεαρός με το όνομα Monkey D. Luffy είναι έτοιμος να ξεκινήσει τη δική του περιπέτεια, αναζητώντας το One Piece και πασχίζοντας να γίνει ο νέος Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών. Οπλισμένος μόνο με ένα ψάθινο καπέλο, μια μικρή βάρκα και ένα ελαστικό σώμα, ξεκινά ένα φανταστικό ταξίδι για να συγκεντρώσει το δικό του πλήρωμα και ένα άξιο πλοίο που θα διασχίσει τη Μεγάλη Γραμμή για να διεκδικήσει τη μεγαλύτερη θέση στην ανοιχτή θάλασσα.
description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

title.en: The Supporting Female Is Reborn, She Will No Longer Serve This Broken Plot

altTitles.zh: 女配重生，这破剧情她不伺候了

description.en:
Yin Susu couldn't believe that she was reborn again, her life was repeating again, the setting was the same, the painful things were the same.

She thought that she would just become a salted fish,* living a lazy life, waiting for death, waiting for everything to end, for the female lead to die, which would mean the end of everything, but she did not want to accept her fate!

"If you, the female lead, has a golden hand, then I will break that golden hand."

*salted fish: metaphor of a corpse or a person who doesn't want to do anything.

title.en: You Are The Culprit‼️

altTitles.ja: 犯人はお前だ‼️

description.en: A detective is asked to find out who is the mysterious stalker...

title.en: Off-Stage Love Side

altTitles.ja: オフステージラブサイド

description.en: 5 years ago, high-schooler Tomoya faked his age and tried to get laid at a gay bar. While the attempt failed, he never forgot the man he had encountered, Kei. After being told he was attractive by Kei, Tomoya went on to become a famous idol in the group INCITE. After an incident with a stalker, Tomoya got assigned a personal bodyguard, who turned out to be none other than Kei?!

title.en: You Shou Xi Hua

description.en: Youshou Xihua- a non-canon, spinoff slice-of-life mini-theater of the Youshou Yan Manga unrelated to the main plotline. Go read the main story [here](https://mangadex.org/title/151bca3e-db98-4ad2-8d8d-239943b91437/you-shou-yan).

title.en: Iron Ladies

description.en:
**Description translated from the author:**
University graduate Mu Siyun sent his resume to the star fleet on a whim and somehow became the Fleet Admiral! This is the story about an admiral with a harem of 3000 female soldiers conquering the universe.

---

**Translator's version:**
The smartest university student to ever graduate from Daxia University's Department of Political History, Mu Siyun, enlists in Beiyang's Fleet on a whim and somehow becomes the Fleet Admiral. Knowing fully well how the world works and how the rich dominate the poor, Mu Siyun seeks to defy the heavens and bring order and hope back to the universe by cleverly scheming against his enemies.
description.ru: По прихоти судьбы выпускник университета Му Сыюнь отправил свое резюме в звёздный флот и каким-то образом стал адмиралом флота! Это история об адмирале с гаремом в 3000 женщин-солдат, покоряющих вселенную…
description.tr: Üniversiteden mezun olan Mu Siyun, bir heves ile öz geçmişini yıldız filosuna yollar ve her nasılsa filo amirali olur! bu hikaye 3000 kız askerin bir filo amiraliyle evreni ele geçirmesini anlatıyor…

title.en: Freak Island

altTitles.ja: 鬼畜島

description.en: University students shipwrecked and forced to board a deserted island with a serial killer.

title.en: The Yankee Shimizu-san Sitting Next to Me Has Dyed Her Hair Black

altTitles.ja: 隣の席のヤンキー清水さんが髪を黒く染めてきた

altTitles.ja-ro: Tonari no Seki no Yankee Shimizu-san ga Kami Okuroku Sometekita

description.en:
***I dyed my hair black for you..... so notice me.***

"Shimizu-san, you dyed your hair black."
"Ah, yeah." "Why did you dye it all of a sudden?"
"Because…yesterday…"

Shimizu-san, the highschool girl yankee who sits next to Hondo with her newly-dyed hair, gradually lowered her voice, slightly blushed, and laid her face down on the desk. After that, when Daiki Hondo talked with his friend about how he wanted be with a girl who can cook, the next day Hondo ended up partnered with Shimizu-san in cooking class, even though she used to always skip class. When Hondo mentioned that he wished he could try a girl's hand-made cooking, for some reason she brought two bentos to lunch the next day and shared one with Hondo…

---

- [Official Twitter (LN)](https://x.com/yanmizusan)
description.ja:
お前のために髪を黒く染めたんだから……、気づけよな。

「髪染めたんだね」
「ああ」「どうして髪染めたの?」
「お前なんでって……、昨日お前が……」
僕の隣の席に座る金髪から黒髪に染めたヤンキーJK・清水さんは声が少しずつ小さくなり、少し顔を赤らめて机に顔を伏せた。
その後も僕、本堂大輝が友人との恋バナで「女子と一緒に料理したい」と話すと、翌日、いつも授業をサボる清水さんと一緒に料理することになったり、「女子の手料理食べてみたい」と話すと、なぜか二つあるお弁当を分けてくれたり……。
学校で一番怖いヤンキー、実は恋愛に不器用で乙女な清水さんとの青春ラブコメ。

---

- [Web Novel](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16817330654424803992)
- [Official LN (JP)](https://sneakerbunko.jp/series/yanmizusan)

title.en: The Dragon Emperor

altTitles.en: Myriad Paths of the Dragon Emperor

description.en:
The young man Lu Ming bloodline was taken, inadvertently obtained the Supreme Divine Hall, through which to reshape the supreme bloodline, continued on the path of cultivation, since then embarked on a hot blood brilliant martial dao path, along the way began to make continuous adversity, wandering the heavens, and finally achieved the Ten Thousand Dao Dragon Emperor.

---

**Links:**
- [Alternative Raw (AC QQ)](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/ComicInfo/id/651731)
- [Alternative Raw (KuaiKan)](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/13589/)
description.fr: Après avoir été trahi par les personnes qu’il aimait autrefois, Lu Ming a fait l’expérience de la froide réalité du monde de la cultivation. Cependant, par hasard, il obtint l’héritage d’un expert suprême qui connut autrefois le même sort que lui. Désormais, le monde tremblera à la naissance de l’Empereur Dragon Éternel dont les légendes résonneront à travers l’éternité.

title.en: The Superhuman Era

altTitles.th: ยุคแห่งยอดมนุษย์

altTitles.ja: 超人の時代

description.en:
When the xenoterran invasion began, the only ones who stood between us and the monstrous creatures were the superhumans. But while some chose to use this power for good, others had more sinister intentions. Kang Lim is a high school student with a secret -- he’s the vigilante superhero known as the White Cap, fighting back the mysterious monsters whenever he can. But the world he protects isn’t what it seems -- there is more to the emergence of the xenoterran than meets the eye, and strange forces are at play in the shadows...

---

**Links:**
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/chaorendeshidai/list?title_no=1604)
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/theeraofoverman/list?title_no=2877)
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/overman/list?title_no=1743)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001251)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/overman/list?title_no=2817)

---

**Note:** BGM by [MZ](https://www.youtube.com/c/MZmuse/search?query=%EC%B4%88%EC%9D%B8%EC%9D%98%20%EC%8B%9C%EB%8C%80): S2 Chapter 1-3
description.id:
Jika memang ada 'Manusia Super' di dunia ini, Apakah kalian akan percaya dengan hal tersebut? Tiap monster-monster muncul, seorang siswa yang seperti pelajar pada umumnya, memiliki kekuatan super yang dapat menghabisi monster-monster ini. Tetapi.. siapa sebenarnya siswa ini? Dan darimana asalnya monster-monster yang bermunculan ini?

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/chaorendeshidai/list?title_no=1604)

description.ja:
地球に出現した正体不明の怪物たち…。そしてその怪物たちを制圧する超人が登場する！怪物VS超人、まさに「超人の時代」の到来！

---

description.ko:
지구에 근원 모를 괴물들이 출현하고
그들을 제압하는 '초인'들 또한 등장한다.
정체불명의 괴물과 초인, 바야흐로 '초인의 시대'가 도래한다!

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/chaorendeshidai/list?title_no=1604)

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/theeraofoverman/list?title_no=2877)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/overman/list?title_no=1743)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001251)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/overman/list?title_no=2817)

description.ru: Если бы кто-то сказал, что «Супермен» действительно существует в этом мире, вы бы поверили? Каждый раз, когда появляется монстр, студент, или, по крайней мере, выглядит как учащийся, обладающий сверхспособностями, - убивает чудище. Но... кто именно этот герой? И откуда появились эти "другие"?
description.th:
จู่ ๆ โลกของเราก็มีมอนสเตอร์กำเนิดขึ้น ไม่มีใครรู้ว่าพวกมันมาจากไหน แต่การปรากฏของพวกมันมาพร้อมกับพลังเหนือมนุษย์ในผู้คนเช่นกัน มนุษย์เหล่านั้นจึงใช้พลังปกป้องโลกเพื่อสร้างสันติสุข ...ใช่แล้ว นี่คือเรื่องราวของ "ยุคแห่งยอดมนุษย์" นั่นเอง

---

description.zh:
紧急警报！怪物肆虐！
硬核少年超人拯救人类！
男主林江平时在学校里只是一个普通的学生，但这个看似平凡的男孩却肩负着重大的责任——拯救地球！因为他是一个拥有超能力的“超人”。林江和他的搭档们能否成功抵御异人种的威胁？地球又会面临怎样的命运?一场惊险刺激的地球守卫战即将上演！

---

description.zh-hk:
地球上出現了不知從哪冒出來的怪物，為了擊滅這些怪物，「超人」出現了。來路不明的怪物和超人，正好締造出了「超人時代」。

title.en: Demonic Emperor

altTitles.en: The Servant Is the Demon King?!

altTitles.vi: Đại Quản Gia Là Ma Hoàng

description.en:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)
description.pt-br: O protagonista é um imperador mágico e o homem mais forte vivo, ele é traido pelo seu subordinado e é morto, após isso ele reencarna em um menino sem cultivo e começa a trilhar seu caminho para a vingança.

title.en: Tearmoon Teikoku Monogatari ~Dantoudai kara Hajimaru, Hime no Tensei Gyakuten Story~

altTitles.ja: ティアムーン帝国物語～断頭台から始まる、姫の転生逆転ストーリー～@COMIC

altTitles.en: Tearmoon Empire Story: The Reincarnation Reversal Story of the Princess, Starting from the Guillotine

altTitles.th: บันทึกเรื่องราวจักรวรรดิเทียร์มูน จุดพลิกผันชะตากรรมของเจ้าหญิงเริ่มจากบนกิโยติน

altTitles.zh: 迪阿姆帝国物语 ～从断头台开始的、公主的转生逆转传

altTitles.zh-hk: 堤亞穆帝國物語～從斷頭台開始，公主重生後的逆轉人生～

altTitles.en: Tearmoon Empire Story: Beginning from the Guillotine, a Story of a Reincarnated Princess Making a Turn Around

description.en:
In the Tearmoon Empire, the disdained selfish princess Mia was sentenced to death – or at least, she was supposed to have been! Instead, she woke up as her twelve-year-old self??

To avoid the guillotine in her second life, she won't repeat her past failures… "F-For me, something of this level is an easy task!" 

Ultimate self-defense! Strongest self-awareness! Using her previously clumsy, timid princess image, she will go against fate- a once-in-a-lifetime fantasy of fixing history!
description.ja: 崩壊したティアムーン帝国で、わがまま姫と蔑まれた皇女ミーアは処刑された――はずが、目覚めた彼女は12歳の少女に逆戻り？？ 第二の人生でギロチンを回避するため、帝政の建て直しを決意する。手始めに忠義に厚い下っ端メイドと、左遷されかけた優秀な文官を味方につけ、失敗した過去をやり直す日々が始まった。けれど、ミーアの本音は「我が身の安全第一」。仇敵を遠ざけ、人脈作りに励むうちに、なぜか周囲の忖度で次々と奇跡が実現！やがて、身勝手なはずの行動は大陸全土の未来を大きく変えていくのだった……。保身上等！自己中最強！小心者の元(？)ポンコツ姫が前世の記憶を使って運命に抗う、一世一代の歴史改変ファンタジー！
description.es-la: En el Imperio Tearmoon, la despreciada princesa egoísta Mia fue sentenciada a muerte, ¡O al menos se suponía que debía serlo! ¿En cambio, ella se despertó como su yo de doce años? Para evitar la guillotina en su segunda vida, no repetirá sus fracasos pasados​​... "¡P-para mí, algo de este nivel es una tarea fácil!" ¡Última defensa personal! ¡Autoconciencia más fuerte! Usando su imagen de princesa tímida y previamente torpe, irá en contra del destino, ¡Una fantasía única en la vida de arreglar la historia!

title.en: The Most Beautiful Girl in the School is in Love With Me, the xx Artist!?

altTitles.ja: 学園1の美少女は××絵師の俺に惚れている！？

altTitles.ja-ro: Gakuen 1 no Bishōjo wa ×× Eshi no Ore ni Horeteiru!?
Gakuen 1 no Bishoujo wa ×× Eshi no Ore ni Horeteiru!?

altTitles.id: Gadis Nomor 1 di Sekolah Sekaligus Pembuat Karya XXX Jatuh Cinta Denganku?!

altTitles.en: The Number 1 Beautiful Girl in the School is in Love With Me, the xx Artist!?

description.en:
Amesaka Sora, an ordinary high school boy, usually enjoys drawing erotic pictures as a hobby. Since his failure in junior high school, he had planned to hide his hobby in high school... But one day, the student council president and the most beautiful girl in the school, Kisaragi Uguisu, finds out his secret...!?

A coming-of-age rom-com between a beautiful girl at the top of the caste system and one of those male extras!
description.id: Amesaka Sora, seorang siswa biasa yang suka menggambar hal-hal cabul. Karena kegagalannya di SMP, dia menyembunyikan hobinya ini di SMA. Namun, suatu hari, ketua OSIS sekaligus gadis tercantik sepenjuru sekolah, Kisaragi Uguisu mengetahui hobi rahasianya tersebut. Apa yang akan terjadi di antara mereka berdua?

title.en: Foxes Always Lie

description.en: Tang Ran is a sunny and cheerful little fox. In order to graduate from the monster school, she transformed into a human college student and wanted to seduce a human to fall in love with her. However, what she didn't know was that the cold-hearted human female professor she fell in love with, Su Qingci, was actually...? A lie requires countless other lies to cover it up. To make the other person fall in love with them first, the fox will always tell "lies".

title.en: Oswald the Overman in the Lesser Planes of Hell

description.en: An idiot wakes up in hell, and goes on a journey to reclaim their life.

title.en: I Have Nine Quadrillion Simp Gold Coins

altTitles.vi: Ta Có 90 Tỷ Tiền Liếm Cẩu!

altTitles.en: I Have 90 Billion Licking Gold Coins

description.en: Down-and-out university student Chen Yuan, devotedly pursues Goddess Lin Shutong for three years, gets kicked in the face. In his grief, he accidentally activates the “Licking Dog System” with a memory of 90 trillion Licking Dog Money, solely for licking women. The more you spend, the more you get back, and you can also obtain various attribute bonuses, transforming into a little superhero. It's called the Licking Dog System, but do I really want to be a licking dog? As long as I lick enough, I'll be the king. As long as I prove my love with enough money, I can turn the goddess into my licking dog! At this moment, Chen Yuan, who has undergone a great awakening, embarks on his life as a rich and licking dog.

title.en: Flaming Ball Girl Dodge Danko

altTitles.ja: 炎の闘球女 ドッジ弾子

description.en: A modern version of the legendary manga "Flaming Ball boy Dodge Danpei" a hot blooded dodgeball manga! Danko, who inherited Danpei's soul struggles to create the strongest super dodgeball team in the Reiwa era! Will Danko be able to overcome the common sense of the modern world!? Look forward to all the beautiful girls passionately drawn by Koshita Tatsuhiro.

title.en: The Ancient Magus' Bride

altTitles.th: เจ้าสาวผมแดงกับจอมเวทอสูร

altTitles.ja: 魔法使いの嫁

description.en:
With her mother dead and father long gone, Chise Hatori has spent her childhood being passed unwanted from relative to relative, 
until she finally makes her unfortunate way to a strange and improbable auction block.

Offered as a “Slay Vega” to the highest bidder, Chise is purchased by the (literally) boneheaded Elias Ainsworth, 
who promises to take her on as his apprentice.

Elias is a mage, and his world is one of dragons and faeries - but before Chise can begin to get accustomed to all of this, 
Elias drops another bombshell. Apparently Chise isn't just intended to be his apprentice - she will also be his bride.
description.es: Chise Hatori tiene 15 años. Sin parientes, sin esperanzas en la vida y sin habilidades, fue comprada con dinero por un mago no humano...
description.ja: 少女を金で買ったのは、ヒト為らざる魔法使い――……。羽鳥チセ15歳。身寄りもなく、生きる希望も術も持たぬ彼女を金で買ったのは、ヒト為らざる魔法使いだった……。
description.es-la: Chise Hatori tiene 15 años. Sin parientes, sin esperanzas en la vida y sin habilidades, fue comprada con dinero por un mago no humano...
description.pt-br:
Hatori Chise tem apenas 16 anos, mas ela já perdeu muito mais do que o esperado. Sem uma família nem esperança, parece que todas as portas estão fechadas para ela. Mas um encontro acidental começou a mover as rodas enferrujadas do destino. 

Na sua hora mais escura, um misterioso mago aparece diante de Chise, oferecendo uma chance que ela não poderia recusar. 

Esse mago, que parece mais um demônio do que um humano, irá ele trazer a ela a luz que desesperadamente busca, ou afogá-la em sombras ainda mais profundas?

title.en: Parrot Blade

description.en:
"Those with blood on their blades don't cross the Lower Yangtze."

No So-ha, the sole heir to the reputedly invincible Nine Flow Swordsmanship, lives a low-profile life with three sources of income: fishing, ferrying customers across the Lower Yangtze, and as a contract hitman for victims of injustice. Despite trying to stay away from the conflicts among martial arts factions, he finds himself taking up the most dangerous job of all: escorting to safety in Korea a girl who holds the missing part of the Sun Gun Gyung, a 1,500-year-old medical treatise written for Emperor Qin Shi Huang that is the key to achieving immortality.

A Korean xianxia webtoon about a blade-for-hire's adventure in Yuan China.
description.pt-br:
"Aqueles com sangue em suas lâminas não cruzam o Baixo Yangtzé."
No So-ha, único herdeiro da lendária e invencível Técnica das Nove Correntes da Espada, leva uma vida discreta com três fontes de renda: pesca, transporte de clientes pelo Baixo Yangtzé e como um assassino de aluguel contratado para vítimas de injustiça. Apesar de tentar se afastar dos conflitos entre as facções das artes marciais, ele acaba assumindo o trabalho mais perigoso de todos: escoltar com segurança até a Coreia uma garota que possui a parte perdida do Sun Gun Gyung, um tratado médico de 1.500 anos escrito para o Imperador Qin Shi Huang, a chave para alcançar a imortalidade.

title.en: Kabe-yaku nado fuyo to tsuiho sa reta S-kyu boken-sha, (dorei kaiho) sukiru o kushi shite shijo saikyo no kuni-dzukuri

altTitles.ja: 壁役など不要と追放されたＳ級冒険者、≪奴隷解放≫スキルを駆使して史上最強の国造り

altTitles.ja-ro: Kabe-yaku nado fuyō to tsuihō sa reta S-kyū bōken-sha, (dorei kaihō) sukiru o kushi shite shijō saikyō no kuni-dzukuri

altTitles.en: An S-class Adventurer, Banished as the Tank of the Party, Uses His “Slave Release” Skill To Build the Strongest Country in History!

altTitles.pt-br: Um aventureiro classe-S que foi banido como tank da party, usa suas habilidades de “Libertação dos Escrav*s” para construir a nação mais forte da história.

description.en:
I became an S-class adventurer with my childhood friends, using the strength that I’m proud of to attract enemies and have my friends defeat them in the meantime, continuing to play the so-called “tank” role.

I was a paladin, a job specializing in protecting my companions, but perhaps because everyone was protected by me, they did not learn any defense or evasion skills, but only improved their attack skills.

In such a situation, they forgot that they are protected by my skills, and they fired me …… Wait, I don’t care what happens, okay!? Even though your natural defensive power are as good as paper.

But since I had been through a terrible time on my way up to become an S-class adventurer, I decided to take it easy for once and went to the Adventurers’ Guild to accept a request for a relaxing day alone.

I was told that they had tried to cultivate the land in the past, but the monsters that appeared were so strong that all the farmers had run away, so the vast land would be given as a reward to anyone who succeeds. they were rewarded with a large tract of land.

When I went there after being told that “Alex, an S-class adventurer, would be fine!” …… I found that there was not even a village or a house around it, and it’s beyond of what you call the countryside, because it was a land inhabited by monsters.

The land was deserted, with farming tools left unattended, and there was a monster that I had never seen before, and when I managed to defeat it, I acquired the “save Release” skill.

I was told that if I used this skill, it would summon one person of the opposite sx, who is ensaved somewhere in the world, to me.

I thought it would be better for the world if I used this skill, and I activated it immediately, and a beautiful elf girl appeared.

After that, a girl with architecture skill, a princess from a foreign country who was a prisoner …… and I kept freeing people who were ensaved, and before I knew it, a country was formed and I was treated like a king.

title.en: Lady Evony

altTitles.ja: エボニー

description.en:
“Be quiet. Shut up and live like the dead.”  
  
Ebony Vonieck is a convicted felon for the murder of her fiancé and father. While waiting for her execution in prison, she is suddenly released from her hell when she is informed that the progressive Archduke of Schneider Castle is waiting for her. Broken by her imprisonment, resigned to the charges against her, and expecting her life to become a living hell, what awaits her instead is a household of warm employees and servants. Ebony has no idea that the Archduke will help change her life, and make use of her drive to change the chauvinistic social system of the Kingdom of Kalcass that condemned her to die for a crime she didn't commit.  


---
description.es:
"Cállese. No hable y viva como los muertos."  
  
Ebony Vonieck es una criminal convicta por los asesinatos de su prometido y de su padre. Esperando su ejecución en prisión, es liberada repentinamente de este infierno cuando le es informado que el progresista Archiduque del Castillo Schneider le espera. Destruida por su hacinamiento, resignada a los cargos en su contra y con la expectativa de que su vida se vuelva un infierno, lo que le aguarda es un hogar lleno de empleados y sirvientes cálidos. Ebony no tiene idea de que el Archiduque le ayudará a cambiar su vida, haciendo uso de su ímpetu para cambiar el sistema social chauvinista del Reino de Kalcass que la condenó a morir por un crimen que no cometió.  
  


---
description.ru:
"Будь тихoней. Замoлчи. Живи так, слoвнo тебя не существует". Главная герoиня - Эбoни Вoник, осужденная за убийство своего жениха и отца. Ожидая своей казни в тюрьме, она внезапно освобождается из своего ада, когда ей сообщают, что эрцгерцог замка Шнайдер ждет её. Казалoсь бы, её жизнь станет живым адом, oднакo… Вместо этого её ждет домашнее хозяйство с заботливыми слугами? Эбони понятия не имеет, что эрцгерцог поможет изменить её жизнь.  


---

Based on the Original Webnovel by Jaya  
[Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/19742)  
[Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Ebony/3220?tab=episode)

title.en: Daikenja no Manadeshi ~Bougyo Mahou no Susume~

altTitles.ja: 大賢者の愛弟子～防御魔法のススメ～

description.en:
Two childhood friends born in a remote village.

One of the boys, Alfi, was good at everything, and grew up as a handsome genius  with four attributes of magic, and entered the elite magic school as a scholarship student. On the other hand, the other boy, Reese, was a seemingly mediocre and naughty boy who could only use defensive magic for beginners, but in fact he was discovered by a rare Sage and had been educated as a gifted child since he was a child!

And Reese enrolls in the elite magic school with one extremely defensive magic, brilliantly destroying the common sense of childhood friends, teachers and students! An uncaring and selfish commoner pushes the aristocrats away and runs up the school caste at explosive speed!
description.ja: 辺境の村で生まれた幼馴染みの2人。1人は文武両道で魔法四属性持ちの天才（+イケメン）として育ち、エリート魔法学校の特待生入学を見事に勝ち取った。もう1人は初心者向けの防御魔法しか使えない、一見平凡で脳天気な少年。だが、平凡な方の少年リースは、実は稀代の大賢者に才覚を見出され、長年英才教育を受け続けていた！そして彼は極めつくした初心者魔法1つでエリート魔法学校に入学し、幼馴染みや教師や生徒たちの常識を華麗にぶち壊していく！

title.en: MF Ghost

altTitles.ja: MFゴースト

description.en: In the year 202X, when self-driving electric and fuel-cell vehicles are ubiquitous, the racing organization MFG exists. Hosting races in Japan exclusively using cars with internal combustion engine. We follow young half-British, half-Japanese racing driver, Kanata Rivington. Who graduated at the top of his class in racing school and was invited into the series thanks to his teacher's connections.

title.en: Uchi no Dorei ga Akaru Sugiru!

altTitles.ja: うちの奴隷が明るすぎる！

altTitles.en: My Slave is Way Too Cheerful

description.en: Roland is known throughout the world as the Black Knight. He appears calm, cool, and collected on the outside, but secretly he’s anything but - he can’t talk to girls for the life of him. One day, while doing his regular heroic thing, he comes across a slave girl bound and gagged. Roland suddenly realizes - if he saves this slave girl, he can slowly build up his social skills by talking to her. After all, a slave girl has to be as shy as him, right?
description.ja: 悪しき者共から人々を守る高潔な黒騎士、ローランド。彼には一つの悩みがあった。アラサー、独身、女性不信。親や周りの人から結婚を期待されるも、女性への免疫はゼロ。そんな彼が思い至った、素晴らしい(？)女性克服方法。「奴隷の女の子なら、自分にも優しくしてくれるのでは…？」しかし、ローランドが運命的な出会いを果たしたのは、イメージとは180度違う、明るすぎる奴隷少女、ジェシカだった…！

title.en: Shin-Gyeom: The Child of Divine Death

description.en:
"If a male child is born, I will kill you all."

Uha and Ren, two 7-year-old boys from a village of beggars, want to become the legendary sword that draws forth its blade and defeats monsters.

One day, the two boys rescue a fallen legendary sword user, Aiji, in the forest near their village and bring him back. They plead with him to confirm whether they possess any abilities of the legendary sword themselves.

Aiji agrees to check their abilities on the condition that they become his disciples, and he begins to train Uha and Ren, who awaken the powers of the legendary sword.

Seven years pass, and while Ren is away on an errand, the cursed sword, Habuna, enemies of the legendary sword, comes to the village and kills all the villagers, intending to kill both Aiji and Uha as well...

title.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 3 - Stardust Crusaders

altTitles.ro: Aventurile Bizare ale lui JoJo Partea 3: Vitejii Stelelor

altTitles.ja-ro: Dai 3 Bu Kuujou Joutarou: Mirai e no Isan
JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: Stardust Crusaders

altTitles.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 3 Jotaro Kujo: Heritage for the Future

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険
ジョジョの奇妙な冒険スターダストクルセイダース

description.en:
Third story arc of the JoJo's Bizarre Adventure series.

In 1989, Joseph Joestar arrives in Japan to meet his troubled grandson Jotaro Kujo at the request of his daughter Holly. Jotaro has locked himself in a jail cell out of fear that an evil spirit is possessing him and that he may cause harm to others. However, Joseph reveals the truth to Jotaro: this "spirit" is really a "Stand," a physical manifestation of one's fighting spirit. What's more, Joseph and his companion Mohammed Avdol possess Stands of their own and have learned to control them with ease.  
  
Joseph's arrival comes with another piece of news: an old family enemy has returned from the grave, causing the Stands of the Joestar family to awaken. However, when a Stand manifests within Holly, her inability to cope with it leaves her gravely ill, stirring the men into action.  
  
Armed with the power of Stands, a globe-trotting adventure from Japan to Egypt—where their adversary resides—begins. Meeting an array of nefarious Stand users along the way, as well as new allies, the team leads a crusade to save Holly and put an end to their enemy for good.
